text: The path of the Wizard is one of intellect and power. A wizard is not merely a spellcaster, but a scholar of the impossible, a shaper of reality, and a master of the elements. You will learn to bend the forces of nature to your will, and to wield power beyond mortal comprehension. But the path is fraught with peril. It demands keen intelligence, unwavering focus, and an insatiable thirst for knowledge.
